name: LACforSmartHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on my light”
”Alexa, turn off my light”
”Alexa, dim my light to 50 percent”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
LAC is now part of Alexa Connected Home. You can now voice control your home appliances, just simply say: 

"Alexa, turn on my light"
"Alexa, turn off my light"

You can also ask Alexa to set the brightness of your light by saying: 
"Alexa, dim my light to 50 percent"
"Alexa, brighten my light by 10 percent"

To get started:
1, You'll need a LAC Light.
2, Set it up to Wi-Fi network(has internet access) by using our LAC Smart APP which can be downloaded at Google Play or App Store. 

After that you can start using the skill given that you have already linked your account to it.
